[[Borthand]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Bór the Faithful''' was, along [[Ulfang]], one of the two greatest chieftains of the [[Easterlings (First Age)|Easterlings]] that moved into [[Beleriand]] during the late [[First Age]]. == History == Bór's people came into [[Beleriand]] after the [[Dagor Bragollach]]. He and his sons [[Borlad]], [[Borlach]], and [[Borthand]] swore allegiance to [[Maedhros]] and [[Maglor]].{{S|18}} He was one of the few leaders of the Eastern Tribes of Men to remain faithful to the Eldar during the [[Nirnaeth Arnoediad]] (Battle of Unnumbered Tears). This loyalty came at the cost of his life. The Elves, grateful for his loyalty, posthumously awarded him the title "Faithful".{{fact}} == Genealogy[[Bór#Bor's year of birth|NB]] == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| | | | | BOR | | | | |BOR='''BÓR'''

''Bór'' m.|dated=|website=Eldamo|accessed=24 August 2023}}While ''[[Eldamo]]'' considers the name ''Bór'' to be Sindarin, its constituent part is actually in [[Noldorin]] (which was a precursor language to Sindarin). An earlier name for the character was ''Bor'' (without the accent). == Other versions of the legendarium == === Bor's year of birth === In the appendix of ''[[The Lost Road and Other Writings]]'' in ''[[The Genealogies]]'' (dating from the early [[1930]]s), it is stated that Bor (as the character was called at that point in the [[legendarium]]) was born in the year 120.{{LR|A1}}, p. 403 When comparing the above date with its associated text ''[[The Earliest Annals of Beleriand]]'', Bor was born 43 years before the [[Swarthy Men]] entered Beleriand in the year 163.{{SM|7I}}, entry '''year 163''', p. 300 Also, the dates found in ''The Earliest Annals of Beleriand'' were by and large moved 300 years into the future in ''[[The Grey Annals]]'' (c. early [[1950]]s), such that, for example, an event happening in the year 195 in ''The Earliest Annals'' now happened in the year {{FA|495|n}}.{{SM|7Ic}}, ''Annals 155 to 157'', pp. 319-20 {{references|notes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bor}} [[Category:Characters in The Silmarillion]] [[Category:Easterlings (First Age)]] [[Category:First Age characters]] [[Category:Noldorin names]] [[Category:Rulers in Beleriand]] [[Category:Sindarin names]] [[de:Bór]] [[fi:Bór]] [[fr:encyclo:personnages:hommes:1a:orientaux:bor]]
